0: Louisiana Gov. Bobby Jindal says he's considering skipping his speaking engagement at Republican National Convention because of Tropical Storm Isaac. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Jindal said at a news conference Sunday afternoon that he wouldn't leave his state while it's threatened by the storm. Around the time he spoke, a hurricane warning was issued for parts of the state east of Morgan City, which includes the New Orleans area. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR He also called a state of emergency in Louisiana and suggested that people leave low-lying parts of coastal parishes. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Isaac is expected to be a strong Category 2 hurricane
